Everything You Need to Manage Your Business

Powerful features designed for small businesses, from voice-controlled data entry to comprehensive GST reporting.

Voice-Controlled Entry

Forget typing. Just say 'Log expense ₹500 for lunch' and let AI handle the categorization and entry automatically.

Natural Language Queries

Ask questions like 'What's my profit this month?' or 'Who owes me money?' and get instant, accurate answers.

AI-Powered Insights

Get real-time business health scores, predictive analytics, and smart recommendations based on your data.

GST Compliance

Automated GSTR-1 & GSTR-3B generation designed for Indian taxation standards. Export-ready reports.

Instant Reports

Generate Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, and more in seconds with one click.

Business Health Score

A single metric that tells you the financial stability of your business. Track improvement over time.

Smart Alerts

Get notified about low balances, overdue payments, GST deadlines, and unusual transactions.

Outstanding Tracking

Track receivables and payables with aging analysis. Never miss a payment deadline again.

Real-Time Sync

All your data is synced instantly. Your accounts are always up-to-date across all views.
